replacements.old_text:
strbuf_addf(&subject_buffer,
			 "%s"
			 "MIME-Version: 1.0\n"
			 "Content-Type: multipart/mixed;"
			 " boundary=\"%s%s\"\n"
			 "\n"
			 "This is a multi-part message in MIME "
			 "format.\n"
			 "--%s%s\n"
			 "Content-Type: text/plain; "
			 "charset=UTF-8; format=fixed\n"
			 "Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit\n\n",
			 extra_headers ? extra_headers : "",
			 mime_boundary_leader, opt->mime_boundary,
			 mime_boundary_leader, opt->mime_boundary)

additions.new_text:
strbuf_addf(&verify_message, "tag %s names a non-parent %s\n",
				    tag->tag, oid_to_hex(&tag->tagged->oid))

additions.old_line_content: /* otherwise we couldn't verify, which is shown as bad */
* Pass minimum required diff-options to range-diff; others
* When showing a verbose header (i.e. log message),

additions.new_text:
strbuf_addf(&subject_buffer,
			 "%s"
			 "MIME-Version: 1.0\n"
			 "Content-Type: multipart/mixed;"
			 " boundary=\"%s%s\"\n"
			 "\n"
			 "This is a multi-part message in MIME "
			 "format.\n"
			 "--%s%s\n"
			 "Content-Type: text/plain; "
			 "charset=UTF-8; format=fixed\n"
			 "Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit\n\n",
			 extra_headers ? extra_headers : "",
			 mime_boundary_leader, opt->mime_boundary,
			 mime_boundary_leader, opt->mime_boundary)

strbuf_addf(&buffer,
			 "\n--%s%s\n"
			 "Content-Type: text/x-patch;"
			 " name=\"%s\"\n"
			 "Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit\n"
			 "Content-Disposition: %s;"
			 " filename=\"%s\"\n\n",
			 mime_boundary_leader, opt->mime_boundary,
			 filename.buf,
			 opt->no_inline ? "attachment" : "inline",
			 filename.buf)

deletions.old_text:
strbuf_addf(&verify_message, "tag %s names a non-parent %s\n",
				    tag->tag, oid_to_hex(&tag->tagged->oid))

deletions.new_line_content: static int show_mergetag(struct rev_info *opt, struct commit *commit)
* print the graph, up to this commit's line
static int add_graft_decoration(const struct commit_graft *graft, void *cb_data)
static void show_children(struct rev_info *opt, struct commit *commit, int abbrev)
* can be added later if deemed desirable.
static int do_diff_combined(struct rev_info *opt, struct commit *commit)

deletions.old_text:
strbuf_addf(&buffer,
			 "\n--%s%s\n"
			 "Content-Type: text/x-patch;"
			 " name=\"%s\"\n"
			 "Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit\n"
			 "Content-Disposition: %s;"
			 " filename=\"%s\"\n\n",
			 mime_boundary_leader, opt->mime_boundary,
			 filename.buf,
			 opt->no_inline ? "attachment" : "inline",
			 filename.buf)
